update t_table_cfg
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update t_table_cfg set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, table_cfg_name = #{tableCfgName,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, conn_url = #{connUrl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, conn_user_name = #{connUserName,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, conn_password = #{connPassword,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, table_schema = #{tableSchema,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, "table_name" = #{tableName,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, domain_name = #{domainName,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, domain_zn_name = #{domainZnName,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from t_table_cfg
and id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and table_cfg_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{tableCfgName,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, '%')
and conn_url LIKE CONCAT('%', #{connUrl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, '%')
and conn_user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{connUserName,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, '%')
and conn_password LIKE CONCAT('%', #{connPassword,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, '%')
and table_schema LIKE CONCAT('%', #{tableSchema,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, '%')
and `table_name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{tableName,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, '%')
and domain_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{domainName,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, '%')
and domain_zn_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{domainZnName,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, '%')
and create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
